input.sentences: our house is the larger brick house | next to the white house .
the area where we live is near a lake .
this is the fence that acts as a guardrail | near our house .
the shallow mountains are located to the other side of the lake .
this is picture of my car | parked near our house | overlooking the lake .
output.sentences: My aunt and uncle live in the white house next to the larger brown one.
They live in a small town next to a beautiful lake.
The house is protected by a guardrail on one side and a fence on the other.
The shallow end of the lake is located at the bottom of some mountains.
We parked the car at a picturesque spot overlooking the lake.
